name: LawncareGuide
0:
”Alexa, open lawncare guide”
”What is your return policy”
”What is the best temperature to plant grass seed”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lawncare guide
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This lawn care guide is the authoritative source for answers to FAQs related to grass cultivation, planting how-tos, ideal grass conditions, and other topics.  Find answers to questions such as:

When is the best time to plant grass seeds?
What type of soil is best for my grass?
How many times should I water my lawn?
Which products will improve my grass?

Access continuously updated information about lawn care and handy tips to ensure the best quality for your lawn.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
